DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find best dose metaraminol use patient elective cesarean section .
DOC.brief_title: Up-Down Determination ED90 Metaraminol Treat Hypotension During Cesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine effective dose 90 % ( ED90 ) metaraminol treat hypotension spinal anesthesia elective cesarean section ( CS ) . It double-blind study use biased-coin up-down sequential allocation method determine ED90 metaraminol . Baseline systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) determine three automate measure 3 minute apart CS . During period induction spinal anesthesia fetal delivery SBP monitor every minute metaraminol administer every time low baseline value . If SBP fall 80 % baseline value , treatment consider failure . An adequate response define absence hypotension study period .
DOC.criteria: Elective CS spinal anesthesia Normal singleton pregnancy beyond 36 week gestation ASA physical status I/II Age 18 year Patient refusal Allergy metaraminol Preexisting pregnancyinduced hypertension Cardiovascular cerebrovascular disease Fetal abnormality
